article.name: I want to cancel my Mackerel plan/subscription
article.title: I want to cancel my Mackerel plan/subscription
article.body:
Paid plans

  • If subscribed to the Standard plan (credit card payments), click 'Cancel' below and complete the following procedure.
  • If paying a plan subscription via invoice, please contact support.
  • Please note that because Mackerel uses a monthly pay-as-you-go system, if a cancellation is made in the middle of the month, that subscription will last for the entire month and the cancellation (change to the Free plan) will take effect at the beginning of the following month.
  • If you would like to delete an organization when cancelling your subscription, you can complete this procedure after having changed to the Free plan at the beginning of the following month.

Free plan

  • Canceling a free plan is unnecessary, but if you would like to delete an organization or delete your account, please refer to the following.
    • I want to change my organization’s name / I want to delete my organization.
    • I want to delete a user account
